channel.title: Edit client help!
channel.description:
omg, I see now that my others client that I have played also no longer doing :mad: if I click on the run (batchfile) normally there come a black window, but this time that black window is there only 1sec and then the black window is gone and nothing happened. :confused: if I make a printscreen this error comes (i make a printscreen because, the black window is there only for 1 sec. :D):
"Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file."
pls help me
and maybe someone can give me a tut how to edit a client? ;)
p.s sorry for my broken english :D

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @nkmol nkmol
item.description:
@nkmol wrote:

can someone help me whith this error? :
“Java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.”

Read full topic

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Environment variables are a set of dynamic values that can affect the way running processes will behave on a computer.

Right click on ‘My Computer’ then click ‘Properties’ then click ‘Advanced’ then the button saying ‘Environmental Variables’.

Read full topic

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

‘Java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

A, You don’t have Java installed.
B, Your environmental variables are wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @nkmol nkmol
item.description:

omg!!
my compiler works fine!!!
but cant start the server !

if I click on the run (batchfile) normally there come a black window, but this time that black window is there only 1sec and then the black window is gone and nothing happened.
if I make a print screenstate there in Dutch:

“java word niet herkend als een interne of externe opdracht, programma of batchbestand.”

can someone translate this? : P

pls help me

and maybe someone can give me a tut how to edit a client?

p.s sorry for my broken english :D[/quote]

i must download a client?
take the compiler and put it in my client?

i have download a other client and i will edit it.
but the server dons’t work, non of the servers i’ve downloade works.
and i’ve played the server before!

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @pur4hyb1rd pur4hyb1rd
item.description:
@pur4hyb1rd wrote:

Make sure your idk is in C:/program files/java/jdk1.0.6_11

Read full topic

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @nkmol nkmol
item.description:
@nkmol wrote:

i’ve got jdk1.0.6_11 to!

and this is my Compiler:

@echo off
title Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

and the other servers are the same problem and that server dont have a Compile, only a run file…

pls help me

Read full topic

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @pur4hyb1rd pur4hyb1rd
item.description:
@pur4hyb1rd wrote:

Right click your compiler click edit and look for jdk1.0.6_6 and then change it to your version you will probaby change the _6 to _11[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2009, 09:35:40 am[/size][hr]I’m in science class when I get home I’ll do it for you

Read full topic

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Set the compiler so that it uses your Java. If it is set to JDK 6.4 and you have JDK 6.2, it won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Edit client help!
item.dc:creator: @nkmol nkmol
item.description:
@nkmol wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:3, topic:255737”][quote author=lemar513 link=topic=337905.msg2623055#msg2623055 date=1231602764]
k go on folders and then change it then Compile thats it all u need to do is compile
[/quote]

What the hell are you talking about?

Most likely there is an issue with your environmental variables. Make sure you have JDK and the path is set for your compiler correctly.[/quote]

can you tell me how to download and install JDK?

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2009, 01:57:48 pm[/size][hr]i have download JDK already, but i got again the same problem!!!
